about_the_game:
Cooking MeoMeo is a rougelike game where you play as a cat on a journey to find ingredients for bread, the simple reason is because he ran out of bread 😋. The world is built on food and cakes, filled with edible flora, dangerous fauna, and mysterious relics that can aid or hinder your progress. Each level is randomly generated, and permadeath keeps you on your toes. Try to survive and return with the ingredients in hand.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Combat: Fight monsters and bosses to get ingredients for bread.

  • Procedural Generation: The area's layout, monsters, and food sources change with every run, ensuring no two adventures are the same.

  • Choice & Consequence: You will be able to choose one of three cards to increase your power.

Characters:

  • The Adventurer: A cat with a pan 🍳 on a journey to collect bread.

  • Env Denizens: A combination of monsters and creatures made from desserts to giant cakes.

Visuals & Atmosphere:

  • 2.5D Art Style: Cult of the lamb-inspired, with vibrant, atmospheric lighting and detailed environments.

  • Food Aesthetics: Every consumable is lovingly detailed, from juicy roasted meats to strange, glowing fruits that pulse ominously.

  • Dynamic Soundtrack: The music shifts as your hunger grows more desperate, amplifying the tension.

name: Cooking MeoMeo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti; Radeon HD 7750
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050; Radeon R9 380
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: In Cooking MeoMeo, you as a small cat explore the world the find the ingredient for the bread. A roguelike game with close combat and procedurally generated levels.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese
